title: Portfolio Website
tech: React, Framer Motion, Tailwind, Lucide React
description: The highly interactive site you're exploring. Built with React and Framer Motion for smooth transitions, featuring a bento-grid layout, dynamic theming, and a dedicated project document viewer.

title: EduStealth

description: A deceptively simple educational platform that conceals a fully encrypted real-time chat application. Features include a panic mode (double-tap ESC), stealth triggers, and decoy interfaces for maximum privacy.

tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Monaco Editor, Nodemailer
description: A real-time collaborative coding environment. Includes a full-featured Monaco code editor, integrated compiler for multiple languages, and a synchronized problem-solving interface for peer programming.

description: A live auction marketplace facilitating real-time bidding via Socket.io. Includes secure user authentication, Razorpay payment processing, and an automated email notification system.

title: Text Code Converter
description: A developer utility for instant bidirectional conversion between text and formats like Morse Code, Binary, Hex, and Base64. Designed with a clean, dark-themed UI and one-click clipboard integration.

title: AI Virtual Painter
description: A computer vision application that turns your webcam into a touch-free canvas. Uses MediaPipe for hand tracking to let you draw, select colors, and switch tools using intuitive air gestures.

title: Mail Sender
description: A bulk email automation tool designed for efficiency. Reads recipient lists from CSV files and dispatches customized messages using Nodemailer, featuring robust error handling and API triggers.

title: Mail Spam Checker
tech: Python, Tkinter, Scikit-learn, Naive Bayes, Gmail API
description: A desktop GUI application for intelligent email filtering. Integrates with the Gmail API to fetch real emails and uses a Naive Bayes machine learning model to classify messages as spam or legitimate.

title: Finance Tracker
description: A Python-based desktop personal finance manager built with PyQt5. Features transaction categorization, real-time balance updates, and local JSON persistence for privacy-focused budgeting.

title: Habit Tracker
description: A self-hosted web dashboard for tracking daily goals. Features a GitHub-style consistency heatmap, streak analytics, and monthly data visualization charts to keep you motivated.

title: Doc2Pic Tools
description: A collection of efficient automation scripts for document processing. Seamlessly converts PDF pages to high-quality JPGs and transforms Word documents into PDF or image formats.

title: Steganography App
description: A Java-based security tool for hiding secret text messages inside image files. Implements least significant bit (LSB) encoding to ensure the payload remains visually undetectable.

title: Online Quiz Application
description: A comprehensive backend system for conducting exams. Manages question banks, automates scoring, and handles student sessions with a robust MySQL database architecture.

title: Bucket List App
description: A social goal-tracking application. Users can create shared bucket lists, track progress in real-time with Firebase sync, and enjoy a polished Tailwind CSS interface.

title: Smart Research Assistant
description: An AI-powered tool designed to automate information gathering and synthesis for research projects, helping to streamline the data collection process.
